item.title: No title
item.description: Corporate-Based Mindfulness Training A 6-Week Workplace Program for Stress Reduction, Emotional Intelligence, and Performance Enhancement Mindfulness meditation has enjoyed a lot of press lately. The Wall St. Journal, Harvard Business Review, Newsweek, and Time Magazine are talking about companies like Google, Aetna, Genentech- Roche, Gap Inc. and General Mills, applying mindfulness to their modern employee challenges.
